name: Concepta
description:
Concepta is an enterprise technology company with a focus on creating innovative solutions to real-world business problems.
 
Headquartered in Downtown Orlando, our services cover a broad range of enterprise needs, including software and mobile app development, business intelligence, data intelligence, and functional AI tools. Concepta’s goal-oriented approach puts business needs first.
 
We serve an international portfolio of Fortune 100, 500, and Franchise 500 companies and have built multiple top 20 apps on both iTunes and Google Play.
 
Concepta is one of the 10 Fast Growing Companies in Orlando, and CEO Leonardo Farias made Orlando Business Journal’s “40 Under 40” list of influential entrepreneurs.
